Create a virtual assistant that reminds you to start working on the assignment earlier in the future.
Develop a software that predicts when you're likely to the assignment and sends you a notification to start working earlier.
Create a program that analyzes your work habits and suggests the best time for you to start working on the assignment to maximize productivity.
Develop a mobile app that allows you to track your progress on the assignment and sends reminders to start working earlier if you're falling behind schedule.
Create a virtual assistant that generates a personalized plan for completing the assignment, including suggested start times and breaks, to help you stay on track and avoid procrastination.
